DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS SexFS v2.0 Brief Profile (Female) SFINT201 Past 30 Days How Often Wanted Sexual Activity Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response, in the past 30 days, of how often they have been in sexual activity, using a 5-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female) Past 30 Days How Often Wanted Sexual Activity Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how often an individual has felt that they wanted to have sexual activity._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

Concepts.longName: PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)
Concepts.definition: A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days How Often Wanted Sexual Activity Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:A question about how often an individual has felt that they wanted to have sexual activity.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.
A question about how often an individual has felt that they wanted to have sexual activity.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PROMIS:Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System, PROMIS Health Organization and PROMIS Cooperative Group, 2008-2012
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance per K. Laumann

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes with ranges from 1 (Never) to 5 (All the time) on a 5-point Likert scale.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened all of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened all of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: On many occasions, or in many situations.

Concepts.definition: On many occasions, or in many situations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.description: How often have you felt like you wanted to have sexual activity?
